entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
